#include <iostream>
    #include <string>
    #include <cstdlib>
    #include <time.h>
    #include """"Dice.h""""
    #include """"player.h""""
    using namespace std;
    int main()
    {
        srand (time(NULL));
        int playerChoice;
        Dice d(1,6);
        player p;
        cout << """"Enter player name"""" << endl;
        p.setPlayerName();
        cout << """"Your name is """" << p.getPlayerName() << """"."""" << endl << endl;
        cout << """"Time to create a Cootie!"""" << endl;
        cout << """"Please name your Cootie!"""" << endl;
        p.setCootieName();
        cout << """"Add body parts using die rolls."""" << endl;
        cout << """"To roll the die, input 1"""" << endl;
        cout << """"To exit, input 0"""" << endl;
        cin >> playerChoice;
        while(1)
        {
            if (playerChoice == 1)
            {
                p.takeTurn();
            }
            else
            {
                return 0;
            }
        }
    }
